docs.lead_paragraph: Have you been knocking your head against the proverbial wall trying to teach - or learn - expository writing skills? New York Times models can help writers learn how to write an expository essay that is compelling, convincing and authoritative as well as engaging to read - not to mention authentic. Try a fresh approach with these 10 tips.

headline.main: 10 Ways to Develop Expository Writing Skills With The New York Times

docs.abstract: Using Times articles as models to teach and learn authentic writing formats and techniques.
docs.snippet: Using Times articles as models to teach and learn authentic writing formats and techniques.
